page.title: 17Sarah and her friends
page.content: {Sarah}is 14,and she has lived in Thackley for a few months.The only interesting things for her and her friends are the Youth Club and the Cricket Club.She moved to Thackley from Bradford but she prefers Thackley there is more to do and the people are more interesting,since they seem to share her hobbies,and there are more people of her age. {Joanne}came to Thackley from Colne in Lancashire.Like Sarah,she enjoys going to the Youth Club,where she meets her friends,both boys and girls.They dance play pool and darts and video games. The only complaint the girls have is that there is no park where the kids can congregate in Summer. {Michelle}used to live in Wrose,and wishes she were back there.She says that there was much more to do,and more kids of her age.
